bill.summary:
Tracking Reputations Upgrades Societal Trust Act of 2015 or the TRUST Act of 2015
This bill directs the Department of Justice (DOJ) to include in the annual National Crime Victimization Survey statistics on the level of trust between law enforcement agencies and the residents they serve.
Additionally, DOJ must submit an annual report to Congress that includes recommendations to improve levels of trust that it determines to be problematically low.
